translation.en: Is that you on the beach?
translation.zh: 那是你在这海滩上的照片吗？

translation.en: No, no. That's my... That's my mom.
translation.zh: 噢 不 那是我妈

translation.en: Yeah. She came to this beach when she found out she was pregnant with me.
translation.zh: 对 她是在这个海滩发现怀上了我的

translation.en: I've never been, but... it's kind of our beach.
translation.zh: 我从没来过 不过…像是我们的海滩

translation.en: You want to see more photos? I can...
translation.zh: 你还想看更多的照片吗？可以啊…
对不起 我是美国人

translation.en: My friend. You know, mi amiga.
You know, the girl we left back at the hotel?
translation.zh: 就是那个我们留在旅馆的女孩？

translation.en: You know, she smelled like Don Julio...
translation.zh: 身上味道像唐胡立欧酒…

translation.en: She always does this to me, too.

translation.zh: 就像个幽灵 不是吗？

-幽灵 那个词是“A”结尾的
-对“A”结尾的

translation.en: The whole reason I planned to come on this trip, con "A,"
translation.zh: 我计划这趟旅行的唯一原因

translation.en: was to find the secret beach.
translation.zh: 就是找到那个秘密海滩

translation.en: And now she's just stuck back at Las Rocas with the Irish flu.
translation.zh: 可现在她又宿醉在拉斯罗卡斯

translation.en: You don't like it when someone change your plans, do you?
translation.zh: 你不喜欢有人改变你的计划 是吧？

translation.en: No, I don't. It's just, you know.
translation.zh: 不 不喜欢 就是 你知道
你知道为什么吗 嗯？
对 就是像老板一样的

translation.en: Hey... what is this beach called?
translation.zh: （你知道秘密海滩的名字了吗？） 嗨…这个海滩叫什么名字？

translation.en: You're not gonna tell me. Cool.
translation.zh: 你不会告诉我 酷啊

translation.en: No, no, you're cool. You're being cool.
translation.zh: 不 你很酷 你在耍酷

translation.en: This is the island of the pregnant woman...
The nose... the breasts... and her stomach.
translation.zh: 这鼻子…这胸部…和她的肚子
是的 对我来说是的

-不不不 别这样
-不 请收下吧

translation.en: No, we were going the same way.
I live close by, so... don't worry.
translation.zh: 我住在附近 所以…不用了

-卡洛斯 查理
-很高兴认识你 查理
你知道 有 高中

translation.en: I mean, I was in medical school, but we didn't have Spanish there,
translation.zh:
我是说 我在医学院
但是我们那里没有西班牙语

translation.en: just cadavers. I'll shut up now.
translation.zh: 只有尸体 我要闭嘴了

translation.en: Okay, dark in a few hours, so...
translation.zh: 那么 几小时以后天就黑了 所以…
噢 我从来不在晚上冲浪

translation.en: And... how you getting out from here?
translation.zh: 嗯…那你打算怎么离开这里？
别管那个了 谢谢你 卡洛斯

translation.en: Thank you again for taking me here.
What did you say the name of it was again, though? I just forgot for some reason.
translation.zh:
你再说一遍这海滩叫什么名字吧？
我不知怎么忘记了
你说西班牙语吗 金发美女？

translation.en: He say that it is hard to paddle against the current.

translation.zh: 对 我没想到会是这样

translation.en: I almost got caught on the inside coming out.
translation.zh: 我在冲出来时差点被冲倒了
对 美国人 是的！
很接近 是德克萨斯州

translation.en: Yes, we have surf in Texas. It's just not like this, though.
translation.zh:
是啊 我们德克萨斯有冲浪的
不过不是像这样的

translation.en: Hey, this is a secret break. How you find it?
translation.zh:
嗨 这是一个秘密的海滩
你怎么找到的？

translation.en: Someone told me about it a while ago. What's it called?
translation.zh:
之前有个人告诉我的
它叫什么名字？

translation.en: If I tell you, I would have to kill you!
translation.zh: 如果我告诉了你 我得杀了你！

translation.en: Well, that would ruin my day.
translation.zh: 噢 那会毁了我的一天

translation.en: Anything gnarly out here I should know about?
translation.zh: 这里有什么需要我注意的事吗？

translation.en: There's only one tide a day,
and when the tide gets low, it becomes an island.
translation.zh: 潮水下去时 就变成岛了

translation.en: Still have no idea what you're saying.
translation.zh: 还是不知道你们在说什么

translation.en: He's saying that you should come over here.
I'm okay, I'm okay. I'm cool here, thank you.
translation.zh: 噢 我没事 我这里挺好 谢谢了

translation.en: It's rough out here for a little girl from Texas.
translation.zh:
对一个从德克萨斯来的小姑娘来说
这地方可是很凶险的

translation.en: I think I'll be all right.

translation.zh: 噢 我的老天啊 不可能吧

translation.en: It's just as beautiful as she said it was.

translation.zh: 那是不是说…你一个人在那？

translation.en: Well, I wasn't gonna come all this way just to wuss out because I lost my plus-one.
translation.zh:
我大老远来这边
可不会因为没人陪就不来海滩了

translation.en: That's how you wind up on Nancy Grace, okay?
translation.zh:
你这样最后就会
变得像南希格雷斯一样 好吧？

translation.en: Excuse me. I am supposed to be the boring, overprotective sister.
translation.zh:
对不起哦 我就应该是
那个无趣又保护过度的姐姐啊

translation.en: You are supposed to be the fun one.
Sis, the surf here, it's insane.
translation.zh: 老妹 在这里冲浪 太疯狂了

translation.en: You would not believe the perfect tube I just caught.
translation.zh: 你不会相信我刚才找到的完美管浪

translation.en: I could shoot tubes just as good as you, if you would just take me out!
translation.zh:
我冲管浪可以跟你冲得一样好啊
但是你就是不带我出去！

translation.en: I'll take you out as soon as I get back.
-I love you, too, Short Crop. -Is that Nancy?
translation.zh:
-我也爱你 小短毛
-是南希吗？

translation.en: -It's Dad. -Just tell him it's all fine, okay?
translation.zh:
-是爸爸
-就跟他说一切都好 好吧？

translation.en: -Love you. Bye. -No, it's, it's a friend.
translation.zh:
-爱你 拜拜
-不 是个朋友
嗨 南希 不要挂电话

translation.en: I don't know what to say, Nance. I'm at a loss.
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么说 南希 我很困惑

translation.en: -I don't-- I don't-- I can't understand-- -I don't expect you to.
translation.zh:
-我不能理解…
-我不指望你理解

translation.en: I don't know. What do you... What do you want me to say?
translation.zh: 我不知道 你想让我说什么？

translation.en: Say you're not dropping out of med school after all this time, after all this work.
translation.zh:
说你不会退了医学院 在经过了
这么长时间以来 这么多的努力之后

-知道吗 就是不能退学
-好的 爸爸

translation.en: That's enough. Can we just not do this right now, please?
translation.zh: 好了 我们现在不要谈这个好吗？

translation.en: It's what you love. You help people.
translation.zh: 这是你爱做的事 你喜欢救人

translation.en: Well, not everyone can be helped, Dad.
translation.zh: 救不了每个人 爸爸
不要说成是因为她的事了

translation.en: What else would it be about?
If you want to make this about her, then you stay in it.
translation.zh:
如果你想要说成是她的事
那么你就不能退出

translation.en: It's just she fought too hard, Dad.
translation.zh: 可是她战斗得太辛苦了 爸爸
你知道吗？又是为了什么呢？
一定要回家来 南希

translation.en: I gotta go, okay? I'll see you soon.
translation.zh: 我要走了 好吧？很快再见你

translation.en: Yeah, girl, it's getting late. Let's go in.
translation.zh: 是 姑娘 天晚了 我们进去吧

translation.en: I'm gonna catch one last one. Thanks.
translation.zh: 我再冲一个浪头 谢谢

translation.en: -Nice meeting you guys. -See you later, guera.
translation.zh:
-很高兴认识你们
-一会儿见 金发小妞！

translation.en: No, no, no. Where are you taking me?
translation.zh: 噢 不 你要把我带哪去啊？

translation.en: You're not gonna feel a thing, ma'am.
translation.zh: 你不会有什么感觉的 女士

translation.en: I just put some Novocain injections to... numb the area, so...
translation.zh:
我只是注射一些奴佛卡因进去…
去麻痹这一块 所以…

translation.en: you're just gonna feel a little pressure, but...
translation.zh: 你只是会感到有一点压力 但是…

translation.en: you're not gonna feel the stitches, okay?
translation.zh: 你不会感到缝针的 好吧？

translation.en: Yeah. That's a nice... That's a nice union.
translation.zh: 噢 嗯 很好…缝合得很好

translation.en: One more, and then we'll send you on your way.
translation.zh: 还有一个 然后我们就送你走
好了 女士 好好干净地包扎起来

translation.en: Okay, okay. You're gonna be fine.
Now let's loosen this tourniquet for you.
translation.zh: 我来给你把这个止血带放松

translation.en: Okay, you get two minutes of blood flow.
translation.zh: 好的 你完成了两分钟的血液流动

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait. My backpack.
Come back, you can have it!
You can have it! Come back!
Stop! Get out of the water!
Come on! Come on, come on, swim!
I got you! Come on! Come on!

translation.zh: 我在救你呢 小伙伴

translation.en: I'm not very good at ortho, but it just looks like a dislocation.
translation.zh:
矫形不是我的强项
不过看上去好像只是脱臼了

translation.en: I'm just gonna do this quick, okay?
translation.zh: 我就是很快的一下 好吧？

translation.en: It's gonna hurt just for a second,
and then you're gonna be okay.
That's a terrible way to say thank you.
translation.zh: 说谢谢可不是这么说的啊
现在你有个机会了 嗯？

translation.en: Thirty-two seconds from the whale to the rock.
I got you! I got you!
If you find this, please send help right away.
translation.zh: 如果你发现了这个 请立即派人救助

translation.en: I've been attacked by a shark.
He's killed three other people since I got here.
translation.zh:
自从我在这里
它已经让三个人丧了命
它仍然在此徘徊 所以…

translation.en: He's got this big old whale over here, but that-- That's the problem.
translation.zh:
它弄了一条巨大的老鲸鱼在这里
不过这是个问题

translation.en: I swam right up onto his feeding ground.
translation.zh: 我游到了它的捕食地点

translation.en: I've been bitten pretty deeply into my... my gastroc and quad muscles.
translation.zh:
我被它咬得很深
咬进了我的…腓肠肌和四头肌

translation.en: I have a deep gash running vertically down my medial thigh,
translation.zh:
我大腿中部
划开了一条很深的竖向伤口

translation.en: and then it turns lateral, just above my knee.
translation.zh: 然后转为横向 就在膝盖上方

translation.en: And right here, there's one going across my, my posterior calf.
translation.zh:
就在这里
另一道伤口穿过我的小腿后部

translation.en: I'm losing a lot of blood. Gangrene is setting in.
translation.zh: 我流了很多血 坏疽已经开始生出

translation.en: I feel like I'm losing my strength.
I don't think I have much time.
translation.zh: 我觉得我的时间不多了

translation.en: The island I'm on is gonna be taken by the tide in a few minutes.
translation.zh: 我栖身的岛几分钟后就会被潮水淹没

translation.en: I'm about 200 yards off the shore.
translation.zh: 我离海岸有大概180米的距离

translation.en: I never found out what it was called.
translation.zh: 我从来没有弄清楚它的名字

translation.en: There's a buoy, which I'm gonna try to swim to,
translation.zh: 有一个浮标 我打算游去那里
所以 是啊 那是…

translation.en: If you find this, can you just...
translation.zh: 如果你发现这个 请你能否就…

translation.en: Can you just delete that first part and...
translation.zh:
请你能否就删掉之前的部分
然后送到

translation.en: And send it to 10231 Oliver Crescent Drive,
translation.zh:
请你能否就删掉之前的部分
然后送到 10231 奥立弗新月大道
德克萨斯州 高佛斯顿市

translation.en: That's my home. That's where my...
That's where my dad and sister live.
translation.zh: 那是我爸爸和我妹妹住的地方
嗨 爸 嗨 克洛伊

translation.en: I finally got that alone time.
translation.zh: 我终于得到了独处的时间

translation.en: I mean, I'm not totally alone.
translation.zh: 我是说 我不是完全独自一人

translation.en: I got this little dude, Steven Seagull here, keeping me company.
translation.zh:
我有这个小家伙
斯蒂文海鸥 在陪着我呢

translation.en: I fixed him for you, Chlo.
translation.zh: 我替你给他治好了 克洛伊

translation.en: I just don't want you guys to worry, and I don't want you to feel...
translation.zh:
我就是不想让你俩担忧
不想让你们感觉…
知道吧 难过或什么的 因为…

translation.en: and I miss you more than I ever...
translation.zh: 我比任何时候都想你们…

translation.en: I ever even realized I could.
Dad, I gotta get off this rock soon,
translation.zh: 爸爸 我很快就得离开这个岩石

translation.en: but I want you to know I'm gonna fight.
translation.zh: 但是我想让你知道我会去战斗

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay. You got it. Good job.
translation.zh: 没事 你可以的 干得漂亮

translation.en: You didn't like that, 'cause it stings like jellyfish.
translation.zh:
它不喜欢那个
因为那像海蜇一样会蜇人

translation.en: If you find this, please send help right away.
translation.zh: 如果你发现了这个 请立即派人救助

translation.en: I've been attacked by a shark.
He's killed three other people since I got here.
translation.zh:
自从我在这里
它已经让三个人丧了命

translation.en: I'm losing a lot of blood.
I feel like I'm losing my strength.
I love you more, Short Crop.
translation.zh: 我更加爱你 小短毛
不可能 妈妈的海滩 对吧？

translation.en: I don't want you to feel, you know, bad or anything.
translation.zh:
我不想让你们感到
那个 难过或什么的

translation.en: I gotta go, Dad. I'll see you later.
translation.zh: 我要走了 爸爸 回头见

translation.en: -Hey, sweet pea. ...she was a fighter. -I could shoot tubes...
translation.zh: 嗨 宝贝…她是一个战士 我会冲管浪…

translation.en: I'm gonna fight, just like she taught us.
translation.zh: 我会去战斗的 就像她教我们的那样

translation.en: Ready to get wet, Dr. Adams?
translation.zh: 准备好下水了吗 亚当医生？

translation.en: Ma would be proud of you.

translation.zh: 谢谢 爸 该走了

translation.en: Do you think I'll ever be as good as you?
translation.zh:
你觉得我总有一天
会跟你一样厉害吗？
